description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Solihull, United Kingdom. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Stylish Solihull Escape in Heart of Town Overlooking Lake
hotels.description: Frolic in the gorgeous, picturesque English countryside with a stylish escape to Crowne Plaza Solihull, an IHG Hotel. Feel the vibrancy of this historic town, and search for famed English pub food or Michelin-starred cuisine from your prime position. For day-long adventures, explore the nearby Warwick Castle, Cadbury World and Resorts World Birmingham. A delicious meal on the tranquil outdoor terrace awaits your return, or wander along the hotel gardens and lakeside at your leisure.

hotels.title: UK Stylish Solihull Escape near Birmingham with Indoor Pool
hotels.description: Elegant touches and effortless charm make your escape to the stylish voco St Johnâ€™s Solihull memorable from the moment you arrive. Indulge in international cuisine made with local, seasonal produce at Brasserie six5one, sip European wines at the onsite bar, dive into the indoor pool, enjoy a relaxing session in the sauna or hit the treadmill in the health club. Outside of the hotel, explore the National Exhibition Centre, Warwick Castle or mouthwatering Cadbury World.
